short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to not forget to turn on Amazon Smile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Donate your favorite charitable organization by shopping” 

Wondering how? 

Just install our Amazon Smile Helper and it will keep smile.amazon turned on. 

Amazon Smile is a simple and automatic way for you to support your favorite charitable organization every time you shop, at no cost to you. When you shop at smile.amazon.com, you’ll find the exact same low prices, vast selection and convenient shopping experience as Amazon.com, with the added bonus that Amazon will donate a portion of the purchase price to your favorite charitable organization. You can choose from nearly one million organizations to support. Tens of millions of products on Amazon Smile are eligible for donations. You just need to select your charitable organization which you want to donate, the first time for login and that’s it. Every eligible purchase you make at smile.amazon.com will result in a donation. The Amazon Smile Foundation will donate 0.5% of the purchase price from your eligible Amazon Smile purchases. 

So what are you waiting for? Just install our Amazon smile Helper Extension and contribute your valuable share and bring light to millions of people around you.
______________________________________________

			                  “Enjoy Shopping”
______________________________________________
Please feel free to contact me with bugs. I'll fix it immediately.

The extension was not created or endorsed by Amazon. Amazon and AmazonSmile are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc.
